subject_terms_3: Indian National Army (Singapore) Indian National Army Monument Site Bose, Subhas Chandra periodicals
physical_appearance: This clipping is a page from the periodical 'The Orient Illustrated Weekly'. The page is titled 'On the Newsfront'. It includes a collection of black-and-white photographs of cadet officers from the Indian National Army. The keft edge of the page is slightly torn.
sgcool_label_text: "Prior to the World War II period, Indians in Singapore and Malaya retained strong political, sentimental and economic ties with their home country. Anti-colonial thoughts and actions, inspired by the ""call for freedom"" in India
